name: Concentrated Lido
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Curve Finance's](https://curve.fi) Concentrated stETH Pool and stakes it in gauge to collect LDO rewards. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.
